verses.text: ‘I HOKU mohenga ‘i he ngaahi pō Na‘a ku ha‘ao ia, ‘A e taha ‘oku ‘ofa ki ai ‘eku mo‘ui; Na‘a ku ha‘ao ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai te u ma‘u.
Ka u tu‘u mu‘a, ‘o ‘alu fano ‘i he kolo, ‘I he ngaahi hala mo e ngaahi mala‘e, Ka u kumi ki he taha ‘oku ‘ofa ki ai ‘eku mo‘ui: Na‘a ku ha‘ao ia, Ka na‘e ‘ikai te u ma‘u.
Na‘e ma‘u au ‘e he kau le‘o ‘oku taka he kolo: “Kuo mou sio koā kiate ia ‘oku ‘ofa ki ai ‘eku mo‘ui?”

Kuo u ki‘i laka atu ‘iate kinautolu, Pea u ‘ilo ‘a e taha ‘oku ‘ofa ki ai ‘eku mo‘ui: Na‘a ku puke ia, ‘o ‘ikai te u tukuange, Kae‘oua ke u ‘omi ia ki he fale ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē, ‘O fakahū ki he loki ‘o ia na‘a ne fā‘ele‘i au.
Tauange mo kimoutolu, kau ta‘ahine Selusalema, Ke mou manatu ki he fanga kaseli mo hainiti vao; ‘O ‘oua ‘e ue‘i, pe fafangu ‘a ‘ofa, Kae fai ‘ene fa‘iteliha.
Ko hai ena ‘oku hake mai mei he toafa? Hangē koni pou kohu, Kuo faka‘inisēnisi ‘aki ‘a e mula mo e laipeno, Mo e fa‘ahinga ahi kotoa ‘oku ‘omi ‘e he kau fakatau.
Vakai, ko hono fata ē, ko e me‘a ‘a Solomone; ‘Oku kāpui ‘e he onongofulu‘i mafi Mei he kau helo ‘o ‘Isileli,
Ko e kau fakaheletā kotoa, Ko e fa‘ahinga kuo ako tau; Kuo nau takitaha tau ‘ene heletā ‘i hono tu‘a tenga, Telia ‘a e ngaahi nānunga ‘o e pō.
Na‘e ngaohi ‘e Kingi Solomone ha fale ha‘amo mo‘ona ‘Aki ‘a e ‘akau Lepanoni.
Ko hono ngaahi pou na‘e ngaohi siliva, Ko hono fakamalu na‘e koula, Ko hono fakamolū ko e kula po‘upo‘uli, Ko hono ‘aofi na‘e pule‘i ‘ofa, Ko e me‘a mei he kau ta‘ahine Selusalema.
‘Alu atu, kau ta‘ahine Saione, ‘O mamata kia Kingi Solomone, Kuo ‘ai ‘a e kalauni na‘e fakapale ‘aki ‘e he‘ene fa‘ē ‘I he ‘aho ‘o ‘ene mali, ‘Io, ‘a e ‘aho ‘o ‘ene loto fiefia.
